content: प्रमुख {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Facing, turning the face towards. {@--2@} Chief, principal, foremost, first. {@--3@} Respectable, honourable,. {@--4@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) ({%a%}) Headed by, having as chief or at the head; वासुकिप्रमुखाः <ls>Ku. 2. 38.</ls> ({%b%}) Accompanied with; प्रीतिप्रमुखवचनं स्वागतं व्याजहार <ls>Me. 4.</ls> --खः {@--1@} A respectable man. {@--2@} A heap, multitude. {@--3@} The tree called Punnāga. --खं {@--1@} The mouth {@--2@} The beginning of a chapter or section. {@--3@} The time being, the present. (प्रमुखतस् and प्रमुखे are used adverbially in the sense of ‘in front of’, ‘before’ ‘opposite to’; <ls>Bg. 1. 25</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 22</ls>).
